title: need i.d: sans serif, love the Q and R
content:
I spent a day looking through fonts.com with no luck after several attempts at advanced search yielded no success. Can anyone identify or suggest a similar one to the sans serif type in the picture? I really like the Q and R tails.

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317092917im_/http:/typophile.com/files/il_fullxfull_4168.366852002_sav6.jpg)
